p: To compare the levels of NI antibodies after LAIV vaccination and infection, we analyzed the NI antibody content in patients with confirmed influenza A infection, and recipients of A/17/California/09/38 (H1N1)pdm09 LAIV with fourfold or more HI antibody rises. It was shown that on day 6â€“8 after onset of infection, the levels of NI antibodies were significantly higher than at the beginning of the disease ( p = 0.01). Post-vaccination titers of HI antibodies after administration of A/17/California/09/38(H1N1)pdm09 LAIV were only slightly higher than pre-vaccination titers ( Figure 3).
